live_updates: Work to restore services in the area continues. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians will continue working to restore service and we will have an update in the morning.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
62503.summary: Some customers in the Southglen area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
62503.title: June 13 - Winnipeg (Southglen) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 11:54 MT.
